Eva's Knight Lionel Hunter:
Those who have been granted the Nobless title can buy a Blessed Exalted Shield and a Blessed Exalted Sigil.Don't waste this opportunity.
You will be granted access to these items as soon as you prove that you are worthy of the title.
Purchase conditions: Nobless title.
Complete the Noble Material - 4 quest
to be granted the Nobless title. quest
